snippet: Julia Kristeva, through an alter ego in “Teresa, My Love,” imagines the life of Teresa of Ávila.
abstract: Carlene Bauer reviews book Teresa, My Love: An Imagined Life of the Saint of Avila by Julia Kristeva.
lead_paragraph: Julia Kristeva, through an alter ego in “Teresa, My Love,” imagines the life of Teresa of Ávila.
